S02bsu015_u:2: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasamaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma karīramaṇḍale ca /
S02bsu015_u:3: atha khalvāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nekavidyādharakoṭīniyutaśatasahastrastreṇa parivṛto yena bhagavāṃstenopasamakrāmat /
S02bsu015_u:4: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaekānte nyasīda bhagavantametadavocat /
S02bsu015_u:5: idaṃ mama bhagavannekādaśamukhaṃ nāma hṛdayamekādaśabhiḥ kalpakoṭībhirbhāṣitam /
S02bsu015_u:6_0: ahaṃ cettarhi bhāṣiṣyāmi sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya sarvavyādhipraśamanāya
S02bsu015_u:8_0: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyā yadanena hṛdayena
S02bsu015_u:8_1: rakṣe kṛte paritre parigrahe śāntisvastyayane daṇḍaparihare śastraparihare viṣaprahāṇe
S02bsu015_u:8_2: kṛte yaḥ kaścidatikramet na praśamet nedaṃsthānaṃ vidyate sthāptya paurāṇāṃ karma vipacyate /
S02bsu015_u:9: tadasya ca kalpayato 'bhiśraddadhataḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
S02bsu015_u:11: smarāmyahaṃ bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa śatapadmanayanacūḍapratihataraṅgavelakiraṇarājasya nāma tathāgatasya /
S02bsu015_u:15: evaṃ bahukaro 'yaṃ hṛdayam tasmāttarhi śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā satkṛtyāyaṃ hṛdayaṃ sādhayitavyam /
S02bsu015_u:25: na viṣaṃ na garaṃ na jvaraṃ na śastraṃ kāye kramiṣyati /
S02bsu015_u:34: smarāmyahaṃ bhagavanniti daśānāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa mandāravagandho nāma tathāgato 'bhūt /
S02bsu015_u:37: eṣa ca mayā hṛdayaṃ pravartitvā sarvasmin karuṇāyanajñānagarbhabodhisattvavimokṣaṃ (Em 38)
S02bsu015_u:39: ye bandhanabaddhā ye badhyaprāptā ye udakāgnivividhaduḥkhābhyāhatāḥ tadanenāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ layanaṃ trāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhavāmi /
S02bsu015_u:40: yat sarvaduṣṭayakṣarākṣasānāmanena hṛdayena karṣitvā maitracittān dayācittān kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
S02bsu015_u:42: ekavelāṃ prakāśitvā cattvāro mūlāpattayaḥ kṣayaṃ gacchanti pacānantaryāṇi karmāṇi niravayavaṃ tanvīkariṣyanti /
S02bsu015_u:46: sarvamanorathaṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi yaśca caturdaśīpaṃcadaśī māmuddiśya upavasati /
S02bsu015_u:48: tena nāmadheyamapi grahaṇena bhagavan saha so 'yaṃ buddhakoṭīniyutśatasahasrātirekasamam /
S02bsu015_u:55: sādhu sādhu kulaputra yat sarvasattvānāmantike evaṃrūpā mahākaruṇā /
S02bsu015_u:56: śakṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputraḥ anenopāyena sarvasattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitum /
S02bsu015_u:59: tataḥ khalvāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva utthāyasanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅga kṛtvā bhagavataścaraṇayoḥ praṇipatya idaṃ hṛdayamāvartayati sma /
